entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
